name: Zaymo
headline: Interactive email builder for ecommerce brands
description:
Recent changes in email clients made it possible to embed a whole website inside an email.  We've built the first email builder that lets Shopify brands create emails that are fully interactive like websites. 

Zaymo emails decrease friction and increase conversion for product marketing and data collection.

founders.name: Brice Douglas, Founder
founders.description:
I believe that to create is core to humanity, so I love to build things.

In college, I was very involved at the world's largest student-run venture firm and worked in the corporate strategy group of a public YC company. I met Santiago and Danny at a university hackathon, and we decided to work together on Zaymo before dropping out to raise a pre-seed.

I like to be outside. Catch me skiing, rock climbing, and running when I'm not building.

founders.name: Santiago Gomez Paz, Founder
founders.description:
I'm CPO at Zaymo. I worked with Google’s Gmail team to be one of the first companies to send interactive emails, improving completion rates by 3x. I also developed a framework to embed mini-apps in Apple Mail. Before Zaymo, I was doing syntethic data research at MIT. 

I'm from Argentina 🇦🇷, served an LDS (mormon) mission in South Korea 🇰🇷 and love playing tennis.

founders.name: Daniel Jones, Founder
founders.description: Cofounder and CTO of Zaymo with previous experience in AI and biotech at Harvard Medical School. I won $900k+ in pitch competitions throughout undergrad, published several research papers, and was a competitive pianist. Before Zaymo I did enterprise software sales for an early startup and started a coaching program. I've lived in Germany, New Zealand, and Russia and enjoy trail running, big ideas, and chess

generated_description:
**Zaymo: Email That's More Like a Website**

Zaymo is on a mission to transform the way ecommerce brands communicate with their customers through email. Founded in 2023 and a member of Y Combinator's W24 batch, Zaymo is pioneering an interactive email builder that allows Shopify merchants to create engaging, website-like communications directly in their email. This means the days of static, uninviting emails are numbered.

The brainchild of a team of three, Zaymo recognizes that recent technological advancements in email clients mean you can embed an entire website within an email. This innovation reduces friction for users and enhances conversion rates, making it an appealing solution for product marketing and data collection. 

Their capabilities extend to several interactive widgets that facilitate upsells, customer reviews, SMS sign-ups, surveys, and more—all without having customers leave their inbox. For example, Zaymo enables merchants to capture more reviews by embedding forms directly into post-purchase emails. One case study revealed that using Zaymo led to a **42% increase in captured reviews** and a **27% recovery rate of abandoned carts**.

The company remains focused on enhancing customer interaction. They emphasize that "interactivity converts" and leverage no-code solutions, allowing users with little technical expertise to build eye-catching emails that drive conversions. 

To summarize, Zaymo is reshaping email marketing for ecommerce by infusing interactivity into email campaigns, strengthening engagement, and ultimately boosting sales. If you're interested in seeing how this works, you can [get started for free](https://zaymo.com/<https:/app.zaymo.com/auth/sign-up>) or [book a demo](https://zaymo.com/<https:/calendly.com/brice-douglas/demo>).

For more information, check out their website at [zaymo.com](https://zaymo.com).
